alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, south central Wakulla and Franklin Counties through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/, an area of strong winds with gusts to 50 mph was spreading east along the Franklin County coast. It will affect places like Saint George Island, Carrabelle, and Bald Point. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Carrabelle Beach, Royal Bluff, Eleven Mile, St George Island St Pk, Odena, Beverly, Panacea, Buckhorn, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport, Curtis Mill, Hays Place, Fort Gadsden and Nine Mile. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
